languages.text: {n}Ладони Урбенда сжимаются в кулаки, кожа на них белеет.{/n} "Что ты натворил... Как можно... Ваша Светлость!" {n}Он резко поворачивается к вам, словно стремясь закрыть своего отпрыска.{/n} "Это моя вина! Я доверился чести моего сына и тем самым подвел вас! Умоляю, проявите милосердие!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ладони Урбенда сжимаются в твердые кулаки, кожа на них белеет.{/n} "Что ты натворил, щенок... Ваша Светлость, это моя вина. Я доверился чести моего сына, но оказывается, взростить это чувство в нем мне не удалось".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Urbend curls his hands into fists, the knuckles turning white.{/n} "What have you done... How could you... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}He suddenly turns to you, as if trying to shield his son.{/n} "This is my fault! I trusted my son and have failed you in doing so! I beg you, have mercy!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ладони Урбенда сжимаются в кулаки, кожа на них белеет.{/n} "Что ты натворил... Как можно... Ваша Светлость!" {n}Он резко поворачивается к вам, словно стремясь закрыть своего отпрыска.{/n} "Это моя вина! Я доверился чести моего сына и тем самым подвел вас! Умоляю, проявите милосердие!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend's hands clench into fists, their skin turns white.{/n} "What have you done... How could you... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}He suddenly turns to you, as if trying to shield his son.{/n} "This is my fault! I trusted my son and have failed you in doing so! I beg of you, show mercy!"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}He suddenly turns to you, as if trying to shield his son.{/n} "This is my fault! I trusted my son and have failed you in doing so! I beg you, have mercy!"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}アーベントの両手は拳をつくり、強く握りしめるあまり指の関節が白くなっている。{/n}「なんということをしてくれた…よくも…陛下！」{n}アーベントは突然あなたの方を向き、息子の盾になろうとする。{/n}これは私の咎でございます！息子を信じるあまり、この度の行いで陛下の期待を裏切りました！どうか、御慈悲を！」
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend curls his hands into fists, the knuckles turning white.{/n} "What have you done... How could you... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}He suddenly turns to you, as if trying to shield his son.{/n} "This is my fault! I trusted my son and have failed you in doing so! I beg you, have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アーベントの両手は拳をつくり、強く握りしめるあまり指の関節が白くなっている。{/n}「なんということをしてくれた…よくも…陛下！」{n}アーベントは突然あなたの方を向き、息子の盾になろうとする。{/n}これは私の咎でございます！息子を信じるあまり、この度の行いで陛下の期待を裏切りました！どうか、御慈悲を！」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}厄本攥紧了拳头，捏得指节发白。{/n}“你都做了什么啊……你怎么敢……大人！”{n}他突然朝你转过身，似乎想要庇护自己的儿子。{/n}“这全都是我的错！我信任自己的孩子，却辜负了您的信任！我求求您，饶了他吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend curls his hands into fists, the knuckles turning white.{/n} "What have you done... How could you... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}He suddenly turns to you, as if trying to shield his son.{/n} "This is my fault! I trusted my son and have failed you in doing so! I beg you, have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}厄本双手握拳，指节发白。{/n}“你都做了什么啊……你怎么敢……大人！”{n}他突然朝你转过身，似乎想要庇护自己的儿子。{/n}“这全都是我的错！我信任自己的孩子，却辜负了您的信任！求您饶了他吧！”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Urbend, les jointures blanches à force de serrer les poings, se lamente :{/n} « Mais qu'as-tu fait... ? Comment as-tu pu... ? Votre Seigneurie ! »{n}Il se tourne soudain vers vous, comme pour protéger son fils.{/n} « C'est ma faute ! J'ai fait confiance à mon fils, et ce faisant, je vous ai {mf|déçu|déçue} ! Je vous en supplie, ayez pitié ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend curls his hands into fists, the knuckles turning white.{/n} "What have you done... How could you... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}He suddenly turns to you, as if trying to shield his son.{/n} "This is my fault! I trusted my son and have failed you in doing so! I beg you, have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend, les jointures blanches à force de serrer les poings, se lamente :{/n} « Mais qu'as-tu fait... ? Comment as-tu pu... ? Votre Seigneurie ! »{n}Il se tourne soudain vers vous, comme pour protéger son fils.{/n} « C'est ma faute ! J'ai fait confiance à mon fils, et ce faisant, je vous ai {mf|déçu|déçue} ! Je vous en supplie, ayez pitié ! »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Urbend cierra las manos en un puño y la piel de sus nudillos se vuelve blanca.{/n} «¿Qué ha hecho...? ¿Cómo ha podido, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». {n}Se vuelve hacia a ti, como si tratara de proteger a su hijo.{/n} «¡Esto es culpa mía! ¡Confié en mi hijo y le he fallado al hacerlo! ¡Se lo ruego, tenga piedad!».
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend curls his hands into fists, the knuckles turning white.{/n} "What have you done... How could you... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}He suddenly turns to you, as if trying to shield his son.{/n} "This is my fault! I trusted my son and have failed you in doing so! I beg you, have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Las manos de Urbend se cierran en un puño y su piel se vuelve blanca.{/n} «¿Qué ha hecho...? ¿Cómo ha podido, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». {n}Se vuelve hacia a ti, como si tratara de proteger a su hijo.{/n} «¡Esto es culpa mía! ¡Confié en mi hijo y le he fallado al hacerlo! ¡Se lo ruego, tenga piedad!».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Urbend ballt die Hände zu Fäusten. Seine Knöchel färben sich weiß.{/n} "Was habt Ihr getan ... Wie konntet Ihr ... Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Er dreht sich plötzlich zu dir, als würde er zum Schild für seinen Sohn werden.{/n} "Es ist meine Schuld! Ich habe meinem Sohn vertraut und Euch dadurch enttäuscht! Ich flehe Euch an, habt Gnade!"
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend curls his hands into fists, the knuckles turning white.{/n} "What have you done... How could you... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}He suddenly turns to you, as if trying to shield his son.{/n} "This is my fault! I trusted my son and have failed you in doing so! I beg you, have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbends Hände ballen sich zu Fäusten, die Haut wird weiß.{/n} "Was habt Ihr getan ... Wie konntet Ihr ... Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Er dreht sich plötzlich zu dir, als würde er zum Schild für seinen Sohn werden.{/n} "Es ist meine Schuld! Ich habe meinem Sohn vertraut und Euch dadurch enttäuscht! Ich flehe Euch an, habt Gnade!"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Yumruklarını sıkan Urbend'in ellerindeki eklem yerleri beyaza bürünüyor.{/n} "Ne yaptın sen? Bunu nasıl yaparsın?.. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!" {n}Oğlunu korurcasına aniden sana dönüyor.{/n} "Bu hata benimdir! Oğluma güvenerek sizin yüzünüzü kara çıkardım! Yalvarırım, merhamet edin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend curls his hands into fists, the knuckles turning white.{/n} "What have you done... How could you... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!" {n}He suddenly turns to you, as if trying to shield his son.{/n} "This is my fault! I trusted my son and have failed you in doing so! I beg you, have mercy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yumruklarını sıkan Urbend'in ellerindeki eklem yerleri beyaza bürünüyor.{/n} "Ne yaptın sen... Nasıl yaparsın bunu... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!" {n}Oğlunu korurcasına aniden sana dönüyor.{/n} "Bu hata benimdir! Oğluma güvenerek sizin yüzünüzü kara çıkardım! Yalvarırım, merhamet edin!"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
